content: I have not tried turkish simit, but i can tell you that it is a very popular breakfast dish in turkey and one of the most famous street foods. it is a great option for a quick breakfast or snack, and it is commonly sold by street vendors. the sesame seeds on the bread rings give a nice nutty flavor and crispy texture, and it can be paired with various spreads like nutella, cheese, or even cucumber and tomato slices.
